It could whistle tunes like a bird after it learned how from another horse in exchange for carrots...C...It had been painted over by its owner to look like a zebra so that when it escaped (which it often did), people would not recognize that it was actually a horse...D...It had an extra leg growing out from its stomach which made riding it very difficult but never stopped anyone from trying because they knew if they could master this wild creature then they'd be considered an amazing horseman or woman....E..Whenever anyone yelled "Giddy up!" at this particular equine specimen instead of galloping forward as expected,it would turn around and bite them squarely on their behinds whenever anyone yelled "Giddy up!" so no one dared to use that phrase when speaking to or requesting its services in transportation anymore..Answer: The unique feature about this horse was that whenever someone yelled "Giddy up!", instead of galloping forward, it would turn around and bite them on their behinds. Question: If it takes five machines five minutes to make five products how many total minutes would it take?
